com.zonarsystems.twenty20.sdk.tiles

Class ShellTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zonarsystems.twenty20.sdk.tiles.TileBase
      • com.zonarsystems.twenty20.sdk.tiles.ShellTile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShellTilePlusSecondary, ShellTileSecondary

    public abstract class ShellTile
extends TileBase
    The base class for sending tiles to the 2020 Shell.

    • Field Summary

      The constant ACTION_TILE_UPDATED is used for sending a broadcast with a updated tile that the Shell should handle immediately

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(boolean important)
        Send the updated tile view to the shell.
        Specified by:
        send in class TileBase
        Parameters:
        important - when true the tile is broadcast as an important action so that the Shell home screen updates the tile even when the home screen is not in foreground. This ensures that the home screen tile is updated before the home screens comes back into foreground, otherwise a full round-trip to update the tile is necessary.

      • send

        public void send(int badgeCount,
                 boolean important)
        Send the updated tile view to the shell with a badge count for the app.
        Parameters:
        badgeCount - the badge count
        important - when true the tile is broadcast as an important action so that the Shell home screen updates the tile even when the home screen is not in foreground. This ensures that the home screen tile is updated before the home screens comes back into foreground, otherwise a full round-trip to update the tile is necessary.
